intents.name: CreateEntryIntent
samples: I had a dream about {green elephants|contents}
I had a dream about {green elephants that could fly|contents}
I had a dream about {green elephants that flew and jumped over buildings|contents}
I had a dream where {I was invisible|contents}
I had a dream where {I was invisible but twenty feet tall|contents}
I had a dream where {I was invisible but twenty feet tall with a large stovepipe hat and a pet tiger that was green with pink spots|contents}
